summary:
Improved Night Eye Multilingual (Eng, Rus, Fra, Ita, Spa, Ger, Cze, Pol)
This mod improves a Night Eye spell.
descriptionHtml:
Improved Night Eye Multilingual (Eng, Rus, Fra, Ita, Spa, Ger, Cze, Pol)


This mod improves a Night Eye spell. Features:

- Plugin removes duration of a night vision. Now you can always turn off or turn on it by pressing Z button.
- This spell had a long and annoying activation sound. This plugin removes sounds of activation and deactivation.
- Effect is changed too, so it affects not only Khajiit\'s Night Eye but also Vampire\'s and Werewolf\'s.
- Mod is multilingual, and supports English, Russian, French, Italian, Spanish, German, Czech and Polish versions of Skyrim.

If you want to add your language, please PM me.

Author: Solitarius
Language adaptation: TERAB1T (ElderScrolls.Net)

This mod on Steam [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=14796]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=14796[/url]
author: Solitarius
